title: How can I operate all chat heads in same time for messenger in bubble notification?
content:
I saw the bubble notification in Android 11. It works also but not for all chat heads in messenger. It doesn't work for whatsapp too!!! When I got a message from messenger as a bubble. I opened that but in that same time I received another message from messenger from different person as bubble I wasn't able to open that. When I clicked on that for open that showed me nothing. It qas showing me previous person's messages. 

I don't know that this thing is happening for everyone or not!!! 
I am requesting to fix this ... Really it is so annoying.
